game.name: Dungeon Bodega Simulator
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 텍스트 크기 조절, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Dungeon Bodega Simulator is a retro styled fantasy shop game where you can grow crops, brew potions, sell items and raise slimes as pets! Can you build up your bodega into a one stop adventuring shop while solving the mysteries of the dungeon beneath you?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dungeon Bodega Simulator is a retro styled fantasy shop game where you can grow crops, brew potions, sell items and raise slimes as pets! Can you build up your bodega into a one stop adventuring shop while solving the mysteries of the dungeon beneath you?
